Epsom Downs Racecourse is being reported as one of the confirmed locations for a mass vaccination centre. 
The Surrey venue has apparently been earmarked for the large-scale immunisation roll-out.

articles.title: Operation Beat Covid: How the new jab works, when and where you get it, and who gets it first - Daily Mail
articles.description: Ahead of the biggest vaccination drive in history,  here's a guide to how it will work, when and where you will get it and who will get it first as officials hope to have millions of doses by the end of the year.
articles.content:
It will be the biggest vaccination drive in history, a logistical operation almost unparalleled in peacetime, but what will it mean for you and your loved ones?
